resources.string: 6 steps for brushing teeth with your child

Children need an adult to assist with thorough brushing until they are 8 or 9 years old. Let them have a turn and then Mum or Dad have a turn to ensure teeth are clean.
Teeth can be brushed twice daily with fluoride containing toothpaste. A small, soft bristled brush is ideal for children. Regular daily flossing can start as soon as two teeth are in contact. with your child
MAKE SURE TO BRUSH YOUR TEETH FOR A GOOD 2 MINUTES
